title: “I want to honor God”: Erika Kirk addresses backlash as Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl LX show outshines TPUSA’s halftime show
summary_full: Erika Kirk spoke out after Turning Point USA aired its alternative Super Bowl LX halftime show honoring her late husband, Charlie Kirk. The broadcast featured a tribute montage and patriotic performances, claiming millions of viewers despite streaming restrictions. While Bad Bunny headlined the official NFL show, the rival event blended politics, grief, and culture into a deeply emotional night.
